title: Gordon Brown (rugby league)
summary: Gordon F. Brown (birth registered fourth ¼ 1930) is an English World Cup winning former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s, and coached in the 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Leeds and Keighley, as a stand-off, and coached at club level for Keighley.
